name: Volatility
description: This app implements a variety of investigative actions on the Volatility forensics analysis platform.

actions.description: Queries the system memory dump file for a list of processes and their information
actions.verbose: The action first tries to run the psscan volatility plugin, but if this plugin does not yield any data, then the pslist plugin is executed

vault_id.description: Phantom Vault ID of the dump file

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

actions.description: Extracts the process file from the memory dump

pid.description: PID of the process to extract

vault_id.description: Phantom Vault ID of the dump file

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

actions.description: Execute the driverscan volatility plugin to list loaded drivers

vault_id.description: Phantom Vault ID of the dump file

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

actions.description: Execute the mutantscan volatility plugin to list mutexes

vault_id.description: Phantom Vault ID of the dump file

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

actions.description: Execute the filescan volatility plugin to list open files

vault_id.description: Phantom Vault ID of the dump file

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

actions.description: Execute the malfind volatility plugin to find injected code/dlls in user mode memory

vault_id.description: Phantom Vault ID of the dump file

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

actions.description: Execute the sockscan volatility plugin. This command is only available on Windows XP and Windows 2003 Server.

vault_id.description: Phantom Vault ID of the dump file

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

actions.description: Execute the netscan or connscan volatility plugin to list network connections
actions.verbose: This action will execute the 'connscan' plugin for a WinXP profile or the 'netscan' plugin for Win7 and above.

vault_id.description: Phantom Vault ID of the dump file

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

vault_id.description: Phantom Vault ID of the dump file

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

actions.description: Execute the shellbags volatility plugin to get a list of MRUs (Most recently used items)

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

profile.description: Volatility profile of the memory dump file

key.description: Registry key to extract the details of

hive_address.description: The virtual address of the hive to search in

actions.description: Execute the mftparser volatility plugin to get a list of master file table entries

vault_id.description: Phantom Vault ID of the dump file
